activities: personnel administration (including hiring, promotion, succession planning, talent identification, discipline and termination proceedings, training and career development, and internal investigations); payroll, compensation and incentive decisions; benefits and other human resources administration; public relations and award programs; computer systems access and security; to satisfy legal and regulatory requirements; staffing; safety, occupational health and medical records administration; communications; in connection with corporate initiatives; compliance with legal obligations; travel bookings and expense reimbursement; mergers, acquisitions and divestitures; employee collaboration; and ensuring the proper functioning of the employee database
personaldata: Human resources data. Some data may be processed manually.
recoursemech: data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) or their representatives
